__e: But this thing between Castle and me... is none of your damn business.
I want my money, Mr. Castle, so you better tell me everything you know.
And exactly what time did you and Mr. Castle go to bed last night?
And, by the way, Castle, no matter what you say here, it doesn't prove that your new bff, Billy, didn't off Dave.
Come on, Castle. We have no idea when they're coming back or even if they're coming back at all.
Okay, if that's the case, then... (STAMMERING) I'm...
